transcription: From the time the sun comes up, professional users of outdoor power equipment know that when there's work to be done, the only way to get it done is relying on the best equipment on the market. You depend on performance and durability because your livelihood depends on productivity and efficiency.  day. Quick and easy start-ups, durability, long run time, season after season, performance that allows you to get one job done and keep moving to the next. Superior work demands superior product, which lead to customer satisfaction and repeat business. After all, if your equipment doesn't work, neither do you. You need dependability.  Since 1972, ECHO has been a leading innovator and manufacturer of professional-grade power equipment, priding ourselves on setting industry standards with an unwavering dedication to advanced technology and premium quality, all day and every day.
